price: 189. Alle baana iska leh Boqortooyada (runta ah ee) samooyinka iyo arladaba, Allena wax walba wuu Karaa.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
